query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZPSTW0411 (MANDT , ORDERNO , PSPID , TITLE , RECADDR , RELIFNR , EMPNO , SUPRTCD , LIFNR , LIFNREMPNO , STATE , PCPNUM1 , PCPNUM2 , PCPNUM3 , RECPART , RECRANK , RECNAME , RECTEL , IMPDATE , CRDAT , CRTIM , CRNAM) VALUES(#G_MANDT# , #ORDERNO# , #PSPID# , #TITLE# , #RECADDR# , #G_VEND_CODE# , #G_USER_ID# , #SUPRTCD# , #LIFNR# , #LIFNREMPNO# , #STATE# , #PCPNUM1# , #PCPNUM2# , #PCPNUM3# , #RECPART# , #RECRANK# , #RECNAME# , #RECTEL# , #IMPDATE# , HEX(CURRENT DATE) , HEX(CURRENT TIME) , #G_USER_ID#)
